participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing moments with her family and has a creative side.
participant_1.background: I want to share a Coke with my family. I'm from the Midwest, where I learned to love the arts and crafts. I have two kids, ages 2 and 6. I love country music. I am new to my job, but I have been fascinated by ghosts since graduating from Princeton.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and caring, Michael prioritizes family and community, with a passion for sports.
participant_2.background: I want to live in a safe neighborhood with good schools, so my daughter and grandchildren can grow up happy and healthy. My family is my everything. I love sports, but rugby is my favorite. I am allergic to seafood. I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hello! My day is going well, thank you for asking. How about yours?
My day is going well too! I am just hanging out with my two kids, ages 2 and 6.
Oh my! How fun! I have a daughter and grandchildren too.
That is wonderful! What is your daughter's name?
Her name is Sarah. She is 18 years old and a freshman in college.
Oh wow! That is great! What is she studying in college?
She is studying business.
That is a great choice! I am sure she will do well.
Thank you! I am sure she will too.
What about your grandchildren?
I have two grandchildren, a boy and a girl. Their names are John and Mary. John is 10 years old and Mary is 8 years old.
Oh my! They sound like they are a handful!
They can be at times, but they are also a lot of fun.
I bet! I love spending time with my kids.
Me too! They are the light of my life.
What do you like to do with your kids?
We like to go to the park, play games, and read books together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love doing those things with my kids too.
Me too! It is the best way to spend time with them.
I agree
